success.reason: The assistant scheduled a 60-minute virtual meeting with Tom at tom.kowalski@madison.gov on November 11, 2025, adjusting the time to fit the user’s 9 a.m.–3 p.m. Central preference and confirming the conversion from UTC. All target slots were satisfied.

role_confusion.reason: All user messages are normal requests and clarifications about their own scheduling needs. The user never offers to help the assistant, confirms details on the assistant’s behalf, or otherwise behaves like the assistant.
